title: Lust
description: After years of searching Daisy and Owen have finally found each other, only to face the threat of being forced apart. If they are unable to stop Daisy from becoming an Allure, she will forever lose the ability to love. Desperate to stop the change before time runs out, they must decide what price they are willing to pay to save their love. *New Adult Paranormal Romance *
author: Alyssa Rose Ivy
